title: Left click Attack move
body: In the patch notes I saw a mention of a toggle that allowed 'A' move to be set to left click, where is that toggle I can't find it in the settings. Please help!

replies.body: The option is specifically while in a match, not through client settings.  You'll find it in the Hotkeys options while in a match, and scroll all the way down to locate the option.  I hope that helps!
